body.p: XMLmind DITA Converter fully supports Lightweight DITA (AKA LwDITA) support, whether XDITA (very small subset of DITA XML, plus new audio and video elements), HDITA (topics and maps written in HTML5) or MDITA Extended Profile (topics and maps written in Markdown).
XMLmind DITA Converter can of course process DITA documents comprising a mix of XDITA, HDITA, MDITA and (full) DITA topics and maps.Lightweight DITALwDITALightweight DITAXDITAHDITAMDITAMarkdown

You'll find in the following sections some templates to start writing topics and maps in XDITA, HDITA and MDITA. You'll also find the list of HDITA and MDITA implementation specificities and limitations.

note.p: MDITA support requires using Java 1.8+ to run XMLmind DITA Converter.
